traits.name: Evasion
entries: When subjected to an effect that allows a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, Molliver takes no damage on a successful save or half damage on a failed one, provided Molliver is not {@condition incapacitated}.

traits.name: Special Equipment
entries: Molliver wears  +1 leather armor and boots of levitation.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Molliver makes two Dagger or Shortsword attacks, or one of each.

actions.name: Dagger
entries: Melee/Ranged atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3 damage) piercing damage. The attack deals an extra 7 (2d6 damage) piercing damage if Molliver has advantage on the attack roll or if the target is within 5 feet of one of Molliver's allies.

actions.name: Shortsword
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 6 (1d6 + 3 damage) piercing damage. The attack deals an extra 7 (2d6 damage) piercing damage if Molliver has advantage on the attack roll or if the target is within 5 feet of one of Molliver's allies.

actions.name: Levitate
entries: While wearing boots of levitation, Molliver casts {@spell levitate} (self only).
